name: Snow Golem
damage_immunities: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
book: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

traits.Cold Absorption: Whenever the golem is subjected to cold damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the cold damage dealt.
traits.Immutable Form: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.
traits.Melt: While in an area of extreme heat, the golem loses 1d6 hit points at the start of each of its turns.
traits.Unusual Nature: The golem doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.Multiattack: The golem makes three melee attacks.
actions.Slam: Melee Weapon Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) cold damage.
actions.Snowball: Ranged Weapon Attack: +0+1d4 - 2 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) cold damage.
